reddit_posts.title: My therapist recommended puzzles for anxiety - life changing results
reddit_posts.content: 3 months ago I couldn't sleep. Now I do 20 minutes of puzzles before bed and sleep like a baby. The focus required quiets my racing thoughts.

reddit_posts.title: Grandma's secret to staying sharp at 92
reddit_posts.content: She's done crosswords every morning for 40 years. Doctor says her cognitive function is better than most 70-year-olds.
